dmca.title: Copyrights violation krshosting.com, IP: 69.93.122.170
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Yaroslav [mailto:yarolsav@allinet.net] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 02, 2005 12:23 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyrights violation krshosting.com, IP: 69.93.122.170



Hello, 
I find one of the ThePlanet clients violated our copyrights. 
krshosting.com, IP: 69.93.122.170 
Here it is http://krshosting.com/hostingpackages.html 
They used our http://allinet.net/shared_hosting/linux.php 
Also they copy our TOS. http://krshosting.com/policies.html 
Here is original from our web site.
http://www.allinet.net/legal_information/tos/ 

They even used our images.
